rows.label: qst700501_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, it's you folks.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0002
rows.name:
I've heard about you. You've been
helping people all over, right?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0003
rows.name:
It's not that big of a deal.
We all help each other out
in times of need, right?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0004
rows.name:
Haha, you're as kind-hearted
as the rumors say.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm Dio, a handyman here.
Actually, I have a favor to ask.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0006
rows.name: If it's trouble, we're not interested.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0007
rows.name:
Well, it is trouble, in a
way. It's a matter of love.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0008
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]Love!?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0009
rows.name: Just to be clear, is this about you?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0010
rows.name:
No, the client is a traveling
performer I happened to share
a table with at a diner.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0011
rows.name:
He wants to give a gift to the woman he's
interested in. He ordered a custom piece,
but I'm terribly clumsy with my hands.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0012
rows.name:
What's more, one of the necessary materials
is a rare ore that can only be gathered at
night, so I was wondering what to do.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0013
rows.name: Is that the one called Purestone...?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0014
rows.name:
You know your stuff. It's a stone found
only at Hangnail Crossing in Iira. He
wants to make "Lovers' Whispers" with it.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0015
rows.name:
Um, why don't we take the job?
Helping with love is wonderful!

rows.label: qst700501_msg0016
rows.name:
Sounds good. It would feel bad
to just leave it like this.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0017
rows.name:
If you're curious, you
could just say so.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0018
rows.name: Stop reading too much into things.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0019
rows.name:
Looks like you've come to an
agreement. I'll give you the
necessary items first.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0020
rows.name:
All that's left is to get
the Purestone and craft
it nicely to finish it.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0021
rows.name:
By the way, that name,
"Lovers' Whispers," was the
client's idea, not mine.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0022
rows.name:
To hear whispers before even
becoming lovers... That's amazing.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0023
rows.name:
Fufu, I see. Anyway,
we'll give it a try.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0024
rows.name: Oh, everyone!

rows.label: qst700501_msg0025
rows.name: Oh, there you are.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0026
rows.name:
Fancy meeting you in such a
strange place. What's up?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0027
rows.name:
Hehe, he's teaching me
to read and write.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0028
rows.name: In between jobs, from time to time.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0029
rows.name: Huh, since when?

rows.label: qst700501_msg0030
rows.name:
Don't worry about me. Just take care
of what we talked about earlier.

rows.label: qst700501_msg0031
rows.name: See you later!
